about_the_game:
Take a froggy friend on a tour of the wilds with this exclusive in-game hat, inspired by the Rainforest Alliance.

The Rainforest Alliance is an international non-profit organization working at the intersection of business, agriculture, and forests to make responsible business the new normal. Together with a diverse array of allies, we work to protect forests and biodiversity, take action on climate, and promote the rights and improve the livelihoods of rural people.

Note: This is a cosmetic item only and has no in-game effect.
